title: Display profile names instead of 'Anonymous' for forum message authors

requirements.text: Update the forum message display in the Section Detail page (frontend/src/pages/SectionDetailPage.tsx) so that when rendering each message, it shows the author's saved profile name (from the `authorName` field already present in the message data structure) instead of displaying 'Anonymous' for users who have a profile. If `authorName` is null or empty, fall back to displaying 'Anonymous'. Do not display the principal ID to end users.

quotes: It is show as anonymous but I want it to be the profile names on the profile information tab for anyone that has An account

acceptanceCriteria: Forum messages in the Section Detail page display the author's profile name when `authorName` is available
Messages without an `authorName` (null or empty string) display 'Anonymous' as the fallback
Principal IDs are never shown to end users in the message author display

constraints: The backend already returns `authorName` in forum messages and the frontend type definition already includes this field (as documented in existing features)
Do not modify the backend message retrieval logic or data structure
Only update the message rendering component in frontend/src/pages/SectionDetailPage.tsx
nonGoals: Changing how the backend stores or retrieves author names
Modifying the message data structure or type definitions
Adding new profile fields or authentication logic
